
```{r import.lists.of.metabolic.genes.and.configure}
#import in the txt lists of genes 
Oxphos <- read.table("/Users/paigehalas/ph-future-phd/pdx-norm-brca-integration-project/gene_lists/oxphos.txt")
#convert to characters  
oxphos <- list("OXPHOS" = Oxphos$V1)
#import in the txt lists of genes 
Glycolysis <- read.table("/Users/paigehalas/ph-future-phd/pdx-norm-brca-integration-project/gene_lists/glycolysis.txt")
#convert to characters  
glycolysis <- list("Glycolysis" = Glycolysis$V1)

 ```

``` {r import.Norm.BRCA.data}
load("seurat-objects/norm.brca.integrated.epithelial.Rda")
Norm.BRCA <- norm.brca.integrated.epithelial
```
```{r add.module.scores}
#set the DefaultAssay 
DefaultAssay(Norm.BRCA)<-"RNA"
#Add scores for the oxphos gene lists
oxphos.Norm.BRCA <- AddModuleScore(object = Norm.BRCA, features = oxphos, name = "OXPHOS_Score")
#Add scores for the glycolysis gene lists
glycolysis.Norm.BRCA <- AddModuleScore(object = Norm.BRCA, features = glycolysis, name = "Glycolysis_Score")



FeaturePlot(object = oxphos.Norm.BRCA, features = "OXPHOS_Score1")
FeaturePlot(object = glycolysis.Norm.BRCA, features = "Glycolysis_Score1")

VlnPlot(oxphos.Norm.BRCA, features = "OXPHOS_Score1", split.by = "individual")
VlnPlot(glycolysis.Norm.BRCA, features = "Glycolysis_Score1", split.by = "individual")



```
